scripts.build: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client && npm run build
scripts.install-client: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm install-client && npm run build
scripts.start-dev: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && concurrently "node server.js" "cd client/ && npm start"
scripts.test: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1
scripts.install: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client && npm install
